G

Game - Class in PokerProject
Class Game implements Interface VideoPoker and it represents the core functioning of the Video Poker.
Game(int, Variants) - Constructor for class Game
Constructor specifying the initial balance of the player and the Variants of Video Poker being used.
GameBoard - Class in VideoPokerGUI
Class GameBoard represents the graphical interface of the Video Poker game.
GameBoard(Variants) - Constructor for class GameBoard
Constructor specifying the variant of Video Poker being used (initial balance is set to zero, since it will be set later) and creating a back-end engine of type Interactive.
GamePanel - Class in VideoPokerGUI
Class GamePanel extends Class JPanel and represents the panels type used in Video Poker GUI.
GamePanel() - Constructor for class GamePanel
 
getAdvice(Card[]) - Method in class DoubleBonus
Returns an array that contains the index of cards to hold by the user according to the strategy to win a hand.
getAdvice(Card[]) - Method in interface Variants
Gets the advice for which cards to hold according to both the hand and the variant on use.
getBetValue() - Method in class Game
Gets the current value of the bet (betValue).
getCredits() - Method in class Player
Gets the current money of the player.
getHand() - Method in class Player
Gets the current hand of the player (5 cards).
getHandStr() - Method in class Player
Returns the current hand of the player (5 cards) as a String (example: "7D AH 3C 8H KS").
getInitBal() - Method in class Player
Gets the initial balance of the player.
getNbDeals() - Method in class Statistics
Gets number of deals.
getNbHands() - Method in class Statistics
Gets the array with the number of times each of the possible hands occurred (winHands.length winning + 1 lost).
getPaytableValue(int, int) - Method in class DoubleBonus
Returns the value of a hand according to the bet value.
getPaytableValue(int, int) - Method in interface Variants
Returns the payback of a specific winning hand according to the betting value, which are dependent on the variant on use.
getPosCard(Card[], int, int) - Static method in class DoubleBonus
Returns the position in the hand array (1..5) of a card with a specific value (0..12) and a specific suit (0..3).
getSuit() - Method in class Card
Gets the suit of the card.
getTableCellRendererComponent(JTable, Object, boolean, boolean, int, int) - Method in class PayTable.CellHighlighterRenderer
 
getValue() - Method in class Card
Gets the value of the card.
getWinHand(int) - Method in class DoubleBonus
Returns a specific winning hand of the winning hands array.
getWinHand(int) - Method in interface Variants
Gets the winning hand with a specific index in the array of String.
getWinningHands() - Method in class DoubleBonus
Returns an array of strings containing the several hands the player can have when winning.
getWinningHands() - Method in interface Variants
Gets a string with the available winning hands according to the variant being used.
